project.name: opencode-dynamic-context-pruning
project.description: Automatically reduces token usage in OpenCode by intelligently removing redundant tool calls from conversation history. Features zero-cost automatic strategies, LLM-driven pruning tools, and real-time statistics.

features.title: Why OpenCode DCP?
features.subtitle: Reduce token costs and improve AI response quality through intelligent context management.

list.title: Zero-Cost Automatic Pruning
list.desc: Deduplication, write superseding, and error purging strategies run automatically with zero LLM cost.

list.title: LLM-Driven Tools
list.desc: AI autonomously invokes discard and extract tools to intelligently clean up completed task content.

list.title: Real-Time Statistics
list.desc: View token usage distribution and pruning effects through /dcp context and /dcp stats commands.

list.title: Manual Control
list.desc: Use /dcp sweep command to manually clean up specified number of tool calls when needed.

list.title: Multi-Level Configuration
list.desc: Global, environment variable, and project-level configuration to flexibly adapt to different needs.

list.title: Protection Mechanisms
list.desc: Turn protection, protected tools, and file patterns ensure critical content is never accidentally pruned.
